## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The use of bold typography and contrasting colors makes the logo easily recognizable and visually striking. # K 5 CLASSIC CAR & HOME ## Text Leicht und handlich: Der Hochdruckreiniger K 5 Classic Car & Home ist im Handumdrehen zu verstauen und bequem zu transportieren. Inklusive Car Kit und Home Kit. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.950-706.0 - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Sehr kompaktes, leicht zu transportierendes und einfach zu verstauendes Reinigungsgerät - Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel ## Technische Daten ## Technische Daten - **EAN-Code**: 4066529156174 - **Stromart**: 220 - 240 / 50 - 60 V / Hz - **Druck**: 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14.5 bar / MPa - **Fördermenge**: max. 500 l/h - **Flächenleistung**: 40 m²/h - **Zulauftemperatur**: max. 40 °C - **Anschlussleistung**: 2.1 kW - **Anschlusskabel**: 5 m - **Farbe**: gelb - **Gewicht ohne Zubehör**: 5.6 kg - **Gewicht inkl. Verpackung**: 12.4 kg - **Abmessungen (L × B × H)**: 188 × 252 × 445 mm ## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 5, Stein- und Fassadenreiniger, 3in1, 1 l
Strahlrohrverlängerung [ ]
Rotierende Waschbürste [ ]
Schaumdüse [x]
Trockentuch [ ]

Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch 8 m
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelinjektor Ansaugung
Teleskopgriff [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Wasseransaugung [ ]
## Description The image displays a comprehensive set of cleaning equipment, likely a pressure washer kit. The main components and accessories are as follows: - **Pressure Washer Unit**: - The central piece is a yellow and black pressure washer with a handle and wheels for mobility. It has a hose attached to the front and a power button visible on the body. - **Accessories**: - **Surface Cleaner**: A circular yellow and black attachment designed for cleaning flat surfaces. - **Spray Gun**: A black and yellow spray gun with a trigger, used to control the water flow. - **Lance Attachments**: Two different lance attachments for varying spray patterns and pressure levels. - **Detergent Bottles**: Two bottles of cleaning solution, one with a blue label and the other with a yellow label, indicating different cleaning purposes. - **Brush Attachment**: A round brush with a handle, likely for scrubbing surfaces. - **Foam Nozzle**: A small attachment for applying detergent in foam form. - **Paper Filter**: A brown paper filter, possibly for use in the machine or as a replacement part. The kit is designed for versatile cleaning tasks, suitable for both residential and commercial use. The color scheme is predominantly yellow and black, which is common for this type of equipment. ## Figure Description The image is a graphic representation with a bold, large number "1" in a light gray color on the left side. Overlapping this number is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads: **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND** This suggests a claim of being the top brand in the freelance online market. The use of bold and contrasting colors emphasizes the importance and confidence in the statement. ## Description The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with a circle of 12 stars, representing the European Union flag. Below the shape, the text reads "Made in Europe." - **Shape**: The geometric shape is a stylized representation, possibly resembling a speech bubble or a flag. - **Stars**: The circle of 12 stars is a common symbol of the European Union, signifying unity and identity. - **Text**: The phrase "Made in Europe" is printed in a simple, sans-serif font, indicating the origin of a product or service. ## Description of Figure The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon that appears to depict a power plug or electrical symbol. Above the plug, there is a lightning bolt, suggesting an association with electricity or power. Below the icon, there is text that reads `+100% POWER`. This text is in yellow, matching the color of the icon, and is positioned on a black background, making it stand out clearly. The overall design suggests an emphasis on increased power or efficiency, possibly indicating a feature or setting related to enhanced performance. ## Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable spray pattern. The nozzle is shown with a plus sign, indicating an increase in power or intensity. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. The icon suggests functionality related to variable power settings, likely for a pressure washer or similar equipment. ## Figure Description The image is a figure from a document, likely a chart or graph. Here is a detailed description: - **Title**: The figure does not have a visible title. - **Axes**: - The x-axis and y-axis are not labeled in the visible portion. - **Data Points**: - The figure contains a grid with several data points plotted. - The data points are represented as small dots or markers. - **Trends**: - There is a visible trend or pattern, possibly a line or curve connecting the data points. - **Annotations**: - There are no visible annotations or labels on the data points. - **Legend**: - No legend is visible in the crop. - **Scale**: - The scale of the axes is not visible, making it difficult to determine the exact values of the data points. The figure appears to be a part of a larger chart or graph, and without additional context, specific details about the data or its significance cannot be determined. ## Im Lieferumfang enthalten

## Description

Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The use of bold typography and contrasting colors makes the logo easily recognizable and visually striking.

## Text

Leicht und handlich: Der Hochdruckreiniger K 5 Classic Car & Home ist im Handumdrehen zu verstauen und bequem zu transportieren. Inklusive Car Kit und Home Kit.

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Sehr kompaktes, leicht zu transportierendes und einfach zu verstauendes Reinigungsgerät
- Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel

## Technische Daten - **EAN-Code**: 4066529156174 - **Stromart**: 220 - 240 / 50 - 60 V / Hz - **Druck**: 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14.5 bar / MPa - **Fördermenge**: max. 500 l/h - **Flächenleistung**: 40 m²/h - **Zulauftemperatur**: max. 40 °C - **Anschlussleistung**: 2.1 kW - **Anschlusskabel**: 5 m - **Farbe**: gelb - **Gewicht ohne Zubehör**: 5.6 kg - **Gewicht inkl. ## Description

The image displays a comprehensive set of cleaning equipment, likely a pressure washer kit. The main components and accessories are as follows:

- **Pressure Washer Unit**: 
  - The central piece is a yellow and black pressure washer with a handle and wheels for mobility. It has a hose attached to the front and a power button visible on the body.

- **Accessories**:
  - **Surface Cleaner**: A circular yellow and black attachment designed for cleaning flat surfaces.
  - **Spray Gun**: A black and yellow spray gun with a trigger, used to control the water flow.
  - **Lance Attachments**: Two different lance attachments for varying spray patterns and pressure levels.
  - **Detergent Bottles**: Two bottles of cleaning solution, one with a blue label and the other with a yellow label, indicating different cleaning purposes.
  - **Brush Attachment**: A round brush with a handle, likely for scrubbing surfaces.
  - **Foam Nozzle**: A small attachment for applying detergent in foam form.
  - **Paper Filter**: A brown paper filter, possibly for use in the machine or as a replacement part.

The kit is designed for versatile cleaning tasks, suitable for both residential and commercial use. The color scheme is predominantly yellow and black, which is common for this type of equipment.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, large number "1" in a light gray color on the left side. Overlapping this number is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads:

**WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND**

This suggests a claim of being the top brand in the freelance online market. The use of bold and contrasting colors emphasizes the importance and confidence in the statement.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with a circle of 12 stars, representing the European Union flag. Below the shape, the text reads "Made in Europe." 

- **Shape**: The geometric shape is a stylized representation, possibly resembling a speech bubble or a flag.
- **Stars**: The circle of 12 stars is a common symbol of the European Union, signifying unity and identity.
- **Text**: The phrase "Made in Europe" is printed in a simple, sans-serif font, indicating the origin of a product or service.

## Description of Figure

The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon that appears to depict a power plug or electrical symbol. Above the plug, there is a lightning bolt, suggesting an association with electricity or power.

Below the icon, there is text that reads `+100% POWER`. This text is in yellow, matching the color of the icon, and is positioned on a black background, making it stand out clearly.

The overall design suggests an emphasis on increased power or efficiency, possibly indicating a feature or setting related to enhanced performance.

## Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable spray pattern. The nozzle is shown with a plus sign, indicating an increase in power or intensity. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. The icon suggests functionality related to variable power settings, likely for a pressure washer or similar equipment.

## Figure Description

The image is a figure from a document, likely a chart or graph. Here is a detailed description:

- **Title**: The figure does not have a visible title.
- **Axes**: 
  - The x-axis and y-axis are not labeled in the visible portion.
- **Data Points**: 
  - The figure contains a grid with several data points plotted.
  - The data points are represented as small dots or markers.
- **Trends**: 
  - There is a visible trend or pattern, possibly a line or curve connecting the data points.
- **Annotations**: 
  - There are no visible annotations or labels on the data points.
- **Legend**:

- **Scale**:

The figure appears to be a part of a larger chart or graph, and without additional context, specific details about the data or its significance cannot be determined.
